author: FlagsNZ
title: Accessorise your desk with a useful Lego pencil holder
review:
This is a really useful way in which you can accessorise your desk with a Lego pencil holder.

 Use this model to discreetly announce to the world, your love of Lego.

Parts

There is nothing special about the parts. There are  bright bands of traditional colours. Lego supplied two HB pencils.

Minifigure

There is one hard working painter with a roller painting the side of the pencil holder. He is sitting there working tirelessly with a can of paint and a  cup of hot chocolate.

The build

It is a reasonably basic build.

The completed model

This will look good on any desk whether it be at work or home.

Overall opinion

I have enjoyed raising the awareness of my work colleagues to the potential of Lego in the workplace. There are Lego fans everywhere.
